original: intros x y z. split. - intros H. apply deduction_impp_intros. apply deduction_orp_intros1. apply deduction_impp_elim with (y := z) in H. apply deduction_modus_ponens with (x := prodp (x || y) z) (y := z). + apply prodp_sump_distr_r. + apply deduction_orp_intros1. apply deduction_impp_elim with (x := z) in H. apply H. - intros H. apply deduction_orp_intros1. apply deduction_impp_intros. apply deduction_modus_ponens with (x := prodp x z || prodp y z) (y := z). + apply prodp_sump_distr_l. + apply deduction_impp_intros. apply deduction_orp_intros1. apply H.
